Name: Civil penalties for violations of the littering law.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to civil penalties for violations of the littering law.
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. Subdivision two of section 16-118 of the administrative code of the city of New York, is amended by adding a new paragraph c to read as follows:
   c.  A notice of violation of paragraph a of this subdivision may not be issued to any owner, lessee, tenant, occupant or person in charge of any solely residential building or premises unless a complaint or other report alleging a violation of such subdivision relating to that residential building or premises has been received by the department or other government entity designated to receive such complaints and reports.
  	Â§2. This local law shall take effect thirty days after enactment. 

LS# 2636
CJC -3/12/07
